name: ParadiseLost RPS BATTLE
description:
Now we present RPS BATTLE,
the first release of ParadiseLost game series !
All hope was lost.
Apostles of Satan have terrible power and they have left all human products destroyed.
Our Eden,we trusted its eternity is now desolate,
children's voices we heared with joy have went away
and only the dry cold wind is blowing.
Battle against monsters with RPS using your power of
ovservation, reasoning and all luck.
You'll knock them when their RPS gauge point to zero.
They become sotronger and more cunning as you climb up the tower.
Can you beat all 9 monsters and reach the top?
The human destiny is depending on your fight!
